> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight gave a quick look at the place where saberback dissapeared and
> she took a desition. she followed them but tears started to fall.

LONGRACK and NIGHTLIGHT quickly caught up with the others as they
paused at a junction and looked to the left and right, they could
already hear the sound of soldiers moving through the halls. It would
only be a matter of time before the SHARKTICONS or their dreaded
master SKYBYTE caught up to them.

"If we're going to get out of here we had better hurry." LONGRACK said
as he looked around. "Stampy, Sharpedge" He said, calling to two of
the three soldiers with him. "Take her with you." The 'her' of course
was NIGHTLIGHT as he pointed to her. "Get her to the last portal and
get her out of here."

SHARPEDGE nodded calmly, "But you know where it leads. It still points
directly into Magmatron's other base. That means more of Magmatron,
Saberback and more of their men!"

LONGRACK nodded, "I know, but it's the only way. Go!"

STAMPY nodded, "Come on Sharpedge." He looked over at NIGHTLIGHT,
"Before we can rescue any one else, we have to rescue ourselves
first."

(TAG)

- Preston
